itunes:title: Aurora Straus (Racing Driver!)
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary: Aurora Straus is a professional race car driver, a full-time student at Harvard, and founder of Girls With Drive, a nonprofit that encourages young girls to pursue careers in motorsports. She currently runs with partners Richard Mille and Arch Capital Group in a BMW M4 GT4 in IMSA. @aurorastraus
itunes:subtitle: Aurora Straus is a professional race car driver, a full-time student at Harvard, and founder of Girls With Drive, a nonprofit that encourages young girls to pursue careers in motorsports. She currently runs with partners Richard Mille and Arch Capital Group in a BMW M4 GT4 in IMSA. @aurorastraus
